text: Friendly service and fair prices but the food is a little inconsistent. I have eaten the same meal many times and it's always different. But when it's awesome it's amazing, hence why I keep shaking the dice lol lots of food to try, and worth a shot for sure.
Great authentic Thai food. Priced very reasonable. Great service and friendly staff. Try a Singa beer.

We have been steady customers for 5+ years since we have moved into the  Bradford area.  Great consistent quality of food at a fair price, well kept and quick wonderful service.  The variety of menu options keep us happy.  We would recommend this local small family run restaurant for lunch or diner, dine-in or take-out.
